content: Siyao GuoSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationSiyao Guo Associate Professor,  Computer ScienceRoom S741,  NYU Shanghaisiyao.guo (a) nyu.eduAbout Me [CV]I am an associate professor in Computer Science at NYU Shanghai.   I am on leave this year visiting Prof. Kai-Min Chung.  Before that, I was a postdoc at New York University, UC Berkeley, and Northeastern University.   I did my Ph.D. at the Chinese University of Hong Kong, under the supervision of Andrej Bogdanov. My research interests are theoretical computer science, in particular cryptography, computational complexity, and pseudorandomness. Publications  [DBLP] [Google Scholar]29.  Tyler Besselman, Mika Göös, Siyao Guo, Gilbert Maystre and Weiqiang Yuan:         Direct Sums for Parity Decision Trees.          In CCC 2025.  Pdf.28.  Akshima, Tyler Besselman, Siyao Guo, Zhiye Xie and Yuping Ye:        Tight Time-Space Tradeoffs for the Decisional Diffie-Hellman Problem.        In STOC 2024.
